dialogues: Guard: Hey you! Stop! Get over here! Who are you?
I'm your father
Guard: Hey! Who are you making fun of!? You're not getting in.
I'm Mario's brother
Guard: Anyway, I need to write down who comes and goes. Can I see your identification?
I'm sorry, I'm just here to meet a friend
Guard: Anyway, I need to write down who comes and goes. Can I see your identification?
Do you know who you're talking to!?
Guard: But... I need to write down who comes and goes. Can I see your identification?
Can I just go? I'll only be 5 minutes
Guard: ... Fine
Look, it’s kind of late, just write down my name, Luigi
Guard: ... Fine
I’ll need your identification too when i’m firing you!
Guard: I'm sorry sir, please go on.
Desk Girl: Hi handsome! Can i help you? You seem lost in this big building… Where are you trying to go?
Desk Girl: Hi handsome! Can i help you? You seem lost in this big building… Where are you trying to go?
Desk Girl: Hi handsome! Can i help you? You seem lost in this big building… Where are you trying to go?
I was hoping to use the bathroom
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
Can you point me to the stairs? I feel like working my legs a little. I’m meeting my friend
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
I have an appointment with Mr. Mario
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
I’m meeting my brother upstairs. Level 4, which way?
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
Unless you want to go somewhere with me, I’m just looking to get to level 4
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
I just really need to use the bathroom… I’ll find it on my own, thanks.
I think you’re mistaken. I know my way, thank you.
No wait! I do know you! I think you used to work here! Let me take you where you're headed... don't worry, I insist.
Could be, I’m usually by the bar down the street... [Walk away]
Oh, might be! Good luck on your way to the offices
I don’t have time for this doll [Move to the stairs]
Well, he was cute...
I don’t have time for this doll [Move to the stairs]
Well, he was cute...
